a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of new state-based conflicts, World

Included are
interstate
,
intrastate
, and
extrasystemic
conflicts that started that year.
Data source: Uppsala Conflict Data Program and Peace Research Institute Oslo (2025)
Note: Some conflicts affect several regions, and do not necessarily start at the same time across them. The sum across all regions can
therefore be higher than the global number.
